casebody.data:
JOHN GLADYSZ ET AL. v. PLANNING AND ZONING COMMISSION OF THE TOWN OF PLAINVILLE ET AL.

MCDONALD, C. J., and KATZ and SULLIVAN, Js., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this petition.

The Supreme Court docket number is SC 16346. Hugh I. Manke, in support of the petition. Lawrence J. Golden, in opposition. Decided July 13, 2000

No opinion found.Click here to view source material.
